metadata.title: CVE-2016-10210 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libyara/lexer.l in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) via a crafted rulethat is mishandled in the yy_get_next_buffer function.

criterions.comment: yara: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
